trans-unit.source: This lets you take and upload photos.
trans-unit.target: 写真を撮影してアップロードできます。
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Camera Usage Description

trans-unit.source: This lets you unlock the app.
trans-unit.target: アプリのロックを解除します。
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Face ID Usage Description

trans-unit.source: Websites you visit may request your location.
trans-unit.target: 訪れたウェブサイトがあなたの位置情報を要求しています。
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Location When In Use Usage Description

trans-unit.source: This lets you take and upload videos.
trans-unit.target: 動画を撮影してアップロードできます。
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Microphone Usage Description

trans-unit.source: This lets you save and upload photos.
trans-unit.target: 写真を保存してアップロードできます。
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Photo Library Additions Usage Description

trans-unit.target: 消去して開く
trans-unit.note: This is the menu item that appears when you long press the Focus icon on the phone home screen.

trans-unit.target: 消去
trans-unit.note: Title of the Erase intent.

trans-unit.source: Clear your entire browsing session history, passwords, cookies anytime with a single tap.
trans-unit.target: ブラウジングセッション履歴やパスワード、Cookie を、いつでもワンタップですべて消去できます。
trans-unit.note: Description for the 'History' panel in the First Run tour.

trans-unit.target: あなたの履歴は歴史です
trans-unit.note: Title for the third panel 'History' in the First Run tour.

trans-unit.target: 続ける
trans-unit.note: Button to go to the next card in Focus onboarding.

trans-unit.source: Searching for something different? Choose a different search engine.
trans-unit.target: 何か違ったものを探していますか？ 別の検索エンジンを選んでみましょう。
trans-unit.note: Description for the 'Favorite Search Engine' panel in the First Run tour.

trans-unit.target: 好きな方法で検索
trans-unit.note: Title for the second panel 'Search' in the First Run tour.

trans-unit.target: スキップ
trans-unit.note: Button to skip onboarding in Focus

trans-unit.source: Take private browsing to the next level. Block ads and other content that can track you across sites and bog down page load times.
trans-unit.target: プライベートブラウジングを次のレベルへと進めましょう。サイトを越えてあなたを追跡したり、ページの読み込みを遅くしたりする可能性のある広告その他のコンテンツを自動的にブロック。
trans-unit.note: Description for the 'Welcome' panel in the First Run tour.

trans-unit.target: プライバシーを強化
trans-unit.note: Title for the first panel 'Welcome' in the First Run tour.

trans-unit.target: 詳細情報
trans-unit.note: Button on About screen

trans-unit.source: %@ is produced by Mozilla. Our mission is to foster a healthy, open Internet.

trans-unit.target: スキップ
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the title of the bottom button from the default browser onboarding screen version 2.

trans-unit.source: We clear your history when you close the app for extra privacy.
trans-unit.target: プライバシー強化のため、アプリを閉じると履歴が消去されます。
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the first subtitle for the default browser onboarding screen version 2.

trans-unit.source: Make %@ your default to protect your data with every link you open.
trans-unit.target: %@ をデフォルトブラウザーに設定すれば、開いたリンク先であなたのデータが保護されます。
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the second subtitle for the default browser onboarding screen version 2. %@ is the name of the app (Focus/Klar)

trans-unit.target: %@ は他のブラウザーとは一味違います
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the title for the default browser onboarding screen version 2. %@ is the name of the app (Focus/Klar)

trans-unit.target: デフォルトブラウザーに設定する
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the title of the top button from the default browser onboarding screen version 2.

trans-unit.source: Erase your browsing history, passwords, cookies, and prevent unwanted ads from following you in a simple click!
trans-unit.target: クリックするだけでブラウジング履歴、パスワード、Cookie を消去し、不要な広告による追跡を防ぎます。
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the description of history section from onboarding screen.

trans-unit.target: あなたの足跡から追跡されません
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the title of history section from onboarding screen.

trans-unit.source: %@ is a dedicated privacy browser with tracking protection and content blocking.
trans-unit.target: %@ は追跡防止とコンテンツブロック機能を備えたプライバシー保護ブラウザーです。
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the description of incognito section from onboarding screen. Placeholder can be (Focus or Klar).

trans-unit.target: 匿名化だけではありません
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the title of incognito section from onboarding screen.

trans-unit.source: Configure settings so you can decide how much or how little you share.
trans-unit.target: 設定で共有する量を決められます。
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the description of protection section from onboarding screen.

trans-unit.target: あなたの裁量で保護できます
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the title of protection section from onboarding screen.

trans-unit.source: Take your private browsing to the next level.
trans-unit.target: プライベートブラウジングを次のレベルへ。
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the subtitle for onboarding screen.

trans-unit.target: Firefox %@ へようこそ！

trans-unit.note: This is the title text that is displayed in the Show Me How Onboarding Screen. %@ is the name of the app (Focus/Klar)

trans-unit.target: 追加
trans-unit.note: Button to add a favorite URL to Siri.

trans-unit.target: Siri に追加
trans-unit.note: Button to add a specified shortcut option to Siri.

trans-unit.target: ショートカットを再記録または削除
trans-unit.note: Label for button to edit the Siri phrase or delete the Siri functionality.

trans-unit.target: 消去
trans-unit.note: Title of option in settings to set up Siri to erase

trans-unit.target: 消去して開く
trans-unit.note: Title of option in settings to set up Siri to erase and then open the app.

trans-unit.target: お気に入りのサイトを開く
trans-unit.note: Title for screen to add a favorite URL to Siri.

trans-unit.target: お気に入りのサイトを開く
trans-unit.note: Title of option in settings to set up Siri to open a specified URL in Focus/Klar.

trans-unit.target: 開く URL
trans-unit.note: Label for input to set a favorite URL to be opened by Siri.

trans-unit.source: Lock %@ when a site is open:
trans-unit.target: サイトが開いているときに %@ をロックします:
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the title for biometric tip. The placeholder is replaced with the long product name (Firefox Focus or Firefox Klar).

trans-unit.target: FaceID をオンにする
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the description for biometric Face ID tip.

trans-unit.target: Touch ID をオンにする
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the description for biometric Touch ID tip.

trans-unit.source: Read more about this and other updates to %@.
trans-unit.target: これと %@ の他の更新についてさらに読む。
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the description for release tip. The placeholder is replaced with the short product name (Focus or Klar).

trans-unit.source: Why yes, we do have a fresh new look!
trans-unit.target: ご覧のとおり、外観が新しくなりました！
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the title for release tip.

trans-unit.target: ページ操作 > デスクトップ版を見る
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the description for request desktop tip.

trans-unit.source: Want to see the full desktop version of a site?
trans-unit.target: ウェブサイトのデスクトップ版を開きたいですか？
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the title for request desktop tip.

trans-unit.target: これまでに %@ 個のトラッカーをブロックしました
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the description for share trackers tip. The placeholder is the number of trackers blocked. Only shown when there are more than 10 trackers blocked. For locales where we would need plural support, please feel free to translate this string as `Trackers blocked so far: %@` instead.

trans-unit.target: %@ がブロックするので安心して閲覧できます。
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the title for share trackers tip. The placeholder is replaced with the long product name (Firefox Focus or Firefox Klar).

trans-unit.source: Select Add to Shortcuts from the %@ menu
trans-unit.target: %@ メニューから [ショートカットに追加] を選択します
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the description for shortcuts tip. The placeholder is replaced with the short product name (Focus or Klar).

trans-unit.source: Create shortcuts to the sites you visit most:
trans-unit.target: よく訪れるサイトへのショートカットを作成するには:
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the title for shortcuts tip.

trans-unit.target: Siri のショートカットを追加
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the description for siri erase tip. The shortcut in this context is the iOS Siri Shortcut, not a Focus website shortcut.

trans-unit.target: “Siri、%@ のセッションを消去してください。”
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the title for siri erase tip. The placeholder is replaced with the long product name (Firefox Focus or Firefox Klar).

trans-unit.target: Siri のショートカットを追加
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the description for siri favorite tip. The shortcut in this context is the iOS Siri Shortcut, not a Focus website shortcut.

trans-unit.target: “Siri、わたしのお気に入りのサイトを開いてください。”
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the title for siri favorite tip.

trans-unit.target: トラッキング保護機能をオフにしてみてください
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the description for sites not working tip.

trans-unit.source: Site missing content or acting strange?
trans-unit.target: サイトのコンテンツが表示されなかったり動作がおかしいときは？
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the title for sites not working tip.

trans-unit.target: %@ で検索
trans-unit.note: Text shown on quick action widget inviting the user to browse in the app. %@ is the name of the app (Focus/Klar).

trans-unit.source: Go to Settings to manage specific privacy & security options.
trans-unit.target: 設定を開いて特定のプライバシーとセキュリティの設定を管理します。
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Context Menu icon tooltip

trans-unit.source: These default settings offer strong protection. But it’s easy to tweak the settings to meet your specific needs.
trans-unit.target: これらのデフォルト設定は強力な保護を提供します。必要に応じて、簡単に設定を調整できます。
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Privacy tooltip

trans-unit.source: Start your private browsing session, and we’ll block trackers and other bad stuff as you go.
trans-unit.target: プライベートブラウジングセッションを開始すると、トラッカーやその他の迷惑なものをブロックします。
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Search Bar tooltip

trans-unit.source: %@ stopped this site from spying on you. Tap the shield for info on what we blocked.
trans-unit.target: %@ がこのサイトによるスパイ行動を阻止しました。ブロックしたものに関する情報を見るには盾アイコンをタップしてください。
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Shield icon tooltip. Where placeholder can be (Focus or Klar).

trans-unit.source: Got ‘em! We stopped this site from spying on you. Tap the shield any time to see what we’re blocking.
trans-unit.target: このサイトによるスパイ行為を阻止しました。ブロックしたものに関する情報を見るには盾アイコンをタップしてください。
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Shield icon tooltip when we block trackers for the first time on a website

trans-unit.source: Tap the trash anytime to remove all traces of your current session.
trans-unit.target: ゴミ箱をタップするだけで、いつでも現在のセッションの痕跡をすべて削除します。
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Trash icon tooltip

trans-unit.source: Tap here to trash it all — history, cookies, everything — and start fresh on a new tab.
trans-unit.target: ここをタップして、履歴、Cookie、すべて破棄し、新しいタブで新たに始めましょう。
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Trash icon tooltip

trans-unit.target: 保護されています
trans-unit.note: This is the title text that is displayed for the Privacy tooltip

trans-unit.target: 自動補完にリンクを追加
trans-unit.note: Label displayed for button used as a shortcut to add a link to the list of URLs to autocomplete.

trans-unit.target: ペーストして移動
trans-unit.note: Text for the URL context menu when a user long presses on the URL bar with clipboard contents.

trans-unit.target: 消去
trans-unit.note: Erase button in the URL bar

trans-unit.target: ブラウジング履歴を消去しました
trans-unit.note: Message shown after pressing the Erase button

trans-unit.target: ページ内検索: %@
trans-unit.note: Label displayed for find in page button when typing in the URL Bar. %@ is any text the user has typed into the URL bar that they want to find on the current page.

trans-unit.target: ペースト
trans-unit.note: Text for a menu displayed from the bottom of the screen when a user long presses on the URL bar with clipboard contents.

trans-unit.target: 検索語またはアドレスを入力
trans-unit.note: Placeholder text shown in the URL bar before the user navigates to a page

trans-unit.target: %@ を検索
trans-unit.note: Label displayed for search button when typing in the URL bar

trans-unit.target: ブロックした追跡
trans-unit.note: Text for the URL bar showing the number of trackers blocked on a webpage.

trans-unit.target: 使い方を見る
trans-unit.note: Title for the action button shown on card view that will take the user to a tutorial explaining the user how to add an widget

trans-unit.source: We’ll leave you to your private browsing, but get a quicker start next time with the %@ widget on your Home screen.
trans-unit.target: プライベート ブラウジングはお任せしますが、次回はホーム画面の %@ ウィジェットですばやく開始できます。
trans-unit.note: Subtitle shown on card view explaining the app has a widget option. %@ is the name of the app (Focus/Klar).

trans-unit.target: ブラウジング履歴を消去しました🎉
trans-unit.note: Title shown on card view explaining the app has a widget option

trans-unit.target: %@ で開く
trans-unit.note: Title for action sheet item to open the current page in another application. Placeholder is the name of the application to open the current page.

trans-unit.target: URL をクリップボードにコピーしました
trans-unit.note: Toast displayed after a URL has been copied to the clipboard

trans-unit.target: ロケーションバーを選択
trans-unit.note: Label to display in the Discoverability overlay for keyboard shortcuts

trans-unit.target: %1$@ が %2$@ を開こうとしています
trans-unit.note: Dialog title used for opening an external app from Focus. First placeholder string is the app name of either Focus or Klar and the second placeholder string specifies the app it wants to open.

trans-unit.target: 入力例: searchengine.example.com/search/?q=%s
trans-unit.note: Text displayed as an example of the template to add a search engine.

trans-unit.target: 共有
trans-unit.note: Text for a share button

trans-unit.target: アドレスをコピー
trans-unit.note: Text for the share menu when a user wants to copy a URL.

trans-unit.target: 接続は安全ではありません
trans-unit.note: Text for tracking protection screen showing the connection is not secure

trans-unit.target: 接続は安全です
trans-unit.note: Text for tracking protection screen showing the connection is secure

trans-unit.target: トラッキング防止
trans-unit.note: Title for the tracking settings page to change what trackers are blocked.

trans-unit.source: Protections are OFF for this session
trans-unit.target: このセッションでは保護が無効になっています
trans-unit.note: Text for the status off from Tracking Protection.

trans-unit.source: Protections are ON for this session
trans-unit.target: このセッションでは保護が有効になっています
trans-unit.note: Text for the status on from Tracking Protection.

trans-unit.target: 強化型トラッキング防止機能
trans-unit.note: Text for the toggle that enables/disables tracking protection.

trans-unit.target: %@ 以降トラッカーがブロックされました
trans-unit.note: Text for tracking protection screen showing the number of trackers blocked since the app install. The placeholder is replaced with the install date of the application.

trans-unit.target: ブロックするトラッカーとスクリプト
trans-unit.note: Text for the header of trackers section from Tracking Protection.

trans-unit.target: ライセンス
trans-unit.note: The title of the Licenses setting in the settings that Focus shows in the global iOS Settings app.

trans-unit.source: Content blocking and tracking protection from Mozilla
trans-unit.target: Mozilla によるコンテンツブロッキングと追跡防止
trans-unit.note: Human readable description

trans-unit.source: Add a %@ shortcut to your Home screen. After adding the widget, touch and hold to edit it and select a different shortcut.
trans-unit.target: %@ のショートカットをホーム画面に追加します。ウィジェットを追加したら、長押しして編集し、別のショートカットを選択します。
trans-unit.note: Description for small size widget to add it to home screen. %@ is the name of the app(Focus/Klar).

trans-unit.source: Start a private search in %@ with your default search engine.
trans-unit.target: %@ のデフォルト検索エンジンでプライベート検索を開始します。
trans-unit.note: Description for small size widget to add it to home screen. %@ is the name of the app(Focus/Klar).

trans-unit.target: クイックアクション
trans-unit.note: Quick Actions title when widget enters edit mode

trans-unit.target: %@ で検索
trans-unit.note: Text shown on quick action widget inviting the user to browse in the app. %@ is the name of the app (Focus/Klar).
